name: Dung Roller
description:
Survive and smash everything in your path while bringing your dung beetle woman a ball of dung. 

You control a dung beetle that carries a ball of dung that crushes enemies and grows by absorbing the elements. You must grow it large enough and take it back to your hiding place to win.

The game combines 2D and 3D style in orthographic Top-Down view.

This is the Demo, Can you beat it? 

Enjoy for Free! *Game in development*

Controls: WASD

Español: https://dungrollersecrets.wixsite.com/website
